column4: I'm trying to follow this guide that r00t4rd3d linked me to, http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=202605  How to set up samba, and I'm at the step where you launch samba but it says command not found
where you type samba and its supposed to run samba
that tutorial is very old.. but anyway, try using smbd as the name of the service
